text: @seanhannity F**** you Hannity.  You will be invest’d up ur chute you lyin’ piece OS .   If u think Cuomo will be accountable for following FDA regs, you’re nuts.   How many shs of Novartis r u connected to.   The 2021 Comm’n Coronavirus Pandemic will have ur name in the index.
